youtube.title: How Atherosclerosis Works: Artery Blockage Explained
youtube.description: Understand the biological process of atherosclerosis, from initial wall damage to total artery blockage. This 3D medical animation shows how plaque builds up over time and impacts blood flow through your vessels. Perfect for students and health enthusiasts.
